Introduction

SHINVI (Korean: 신비) was a three-member girl group under SM Entertainment's sister label Cid.K Entertainemnt. They debuted in April 2002 with their first and only album 15 to 30. They disbanded sometime in 2004. Their group name means "to fly towards God" in Korean.
